Package model

Class ReadXController

java.lang.Object
model.ReadXController
public class ReadXController extends Object
Class that represents the controller of the ReadX system

    • createBook

      public String createBook(String name, int pageNumber, GregorianCalendar publicationDate, double price, String url, String briefReview, int genre)
      Method that creates a book object and stores it in the books array
      Parameters:
      name - Book's name
      pageNumber - Book's number of pages
      publicationDate - Book's publication date
      price - Book's price
      briefReview - Book's brief review
      genre - Book's genre (flag value)
      bookPos - Book's position in the books array
      Returns:
      booksCreated String that shows the books created

    • createMagazine

      public String createMagazine(String name, int pageNumber, GregorianCalendar publicationDate, double price, String url, int frequencyOfIssuance, int category)
      Method that creates a magazine object and stores it in the magazines array
      Parameters:
      name - Magazine's name
      pageNumber - Magazine's number of pages
      publicationDate - Magazine's publication date
      price - Magazine's price
      frequencyOfIssuance - Magazine's frequency of issuance
      category - Magazine's category (flag value)
      magazinePos - Magazine's position in the magazines array
      Returns:
      magazinesCreated String that shows the magazines created

    • buyProducts

      public String buyProducts(String id, String productID)
      Method that searches for a product inputed by the user in the books and magazines arrays and sends it to the method buyBook/buyMagazine
      Parameters:
      id - User's id|
      productID - Product's id
      Returns:
      msj Message that shows if the product was bought successfully or an error message if the user doesn't exist, if the product doesn't exist or if the has reached the maximum number of books/magazines he can buy

    • cancelMagazineSubscription

      public String cancelMagazineSubscription(String id, String productID)

      Parameters:
      id - User's id
      productID - Product's id
      Returns:
      msj Message that shows if the magazine subscription was cancelled successfully or an error message if the user doesn't exist, if the product doesn't exist or if the user doesn't have the product
